Comments_List: Lots of insights into emotions and how they impact us and our relationships.
learned about human emotions and how they work
I acquired an incomplete foundation for the study of human emotions in psychology.
I wish we had more discussion style class time so we can discuss the papers and the material more.
the lectures were a little dry and the information slightly confusing

This course is very poorly taught. The instructor puts no effort into organizing his lecture material or explaining the real-world applications of the concepts he is explaining. The syllabus is not well followed. The course could be improved by outlining the lectures more thoroughly, increasing the readability of the lecture slides and following a clear narrative that is well explained at the beginning of each lecture.
Yes, the papers and content are interesting.
no because it was hard to be engaged with the information and the prof

Not at all. Even if you are very interested in the subject matter (as I was), the instructor makes this class not worth it. What I wanted was a solid foundation in the study of human emotion, but what I really got was fragments of information that I could have easily gotten from my own readings or from other related courses.

The lectures (and the syllabus overall) do not follow any clear outline and are very hard to follow. The instructor's teaching style is dull and he clearly does not put in the effort to make the lectures interesting or even arrive to class on time.
